name: Epic Deedge
description: Epic Deedges are born with their head in the clouds, but cranial implants help their intellect reach new heights! These computer-savvy cyclopes make a handy sidekick to any Monster seeking to spruce up a hunk o' junk. Epic Deedge's true passion lies in upgrading its sweet sound equipment with state-of-the-art Shuga Crystal technology, harvested from the sap of Shugabush Island Trees. Gritty Shuga Crystals amplify Barbloo-tooth connectivity at the cost of a few scuffed paws.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 17 hr, Enhanced Time: 1 day 6 hr 45 min
